018package org.kordamp.maven.enforcer.checker;
019
020import org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.EnforcerRule;
021import org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.EnforcerRuleException;
022import org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.EnforcerRuleHelper;
023import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
024import org.codehaus.plexus.component.configurator.expression.ExpressionEvaluationException;
025import org.kordamp.maven.checker.MavenCentralChecker;
026import org.kordamp.maven.checker.MavenLoggerAdapter;
027import org.kordamp.maven.checker.PomCheckException;
028
029import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
030import javax.annotation.Nullable;
031
032/**
033 * Checks if a POM complies with the rules for uploading to Maven Central.
034 *
035 * @author Andres Almiray
036 * @since 1.0.0
037 */
038public class CheckMavenCentral implements EnforcerRule {
039    private boolean release = true;
040    private boolean strict = true;
041    private boolean failOnError = true;
042    private boolean failOnWarning;
043
044    public boolean isRelease() {
045        return release;
046    }
047
048    public CheckMavenCentral setRelease(boolean release) {
049        this.release = release;
050        return this;
051    }
052
053    public boolean isStrict() {
054        return strict;
055    }
056
057    public CheckMavenCentral setStrict(boolean strict) {
058        this.strict = strict;
059        return this;
060    }
061
062    public boolean isFailOnError() {
063        return failOnError;
064    }
065
066    public CheckMavenCentral setFailOnError(boolean failOnError) {
067        this.failOnError = failOnError;
068        return this;
069    }
070
071    public boolean isFailOnWarning() {
072        return failOnWarning;
073    }
074
075    public CheckMavenCentral setFailOnWarning(boolean failOnWarning) {
076        this.failOnWarning = failOnWarning;
077        return this;
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public void execute(@Nonnull EnforcerRuleHelper helper) throws EnforcerRuleException {
082        try {
083            MavenProject project = (MavenProject) helper.evaluate("${project}");
084            MavenCentralChecker.check(new MavenLoggerAdapter(helper.getLog()), project, new MavenCentralChecker.Configuration()
085                .withRelease(release)
086                .withStrict(strict)
087                .withFailOnError(failOnError)
088                .withFailOnWarning(failOnWarning));
089        } catch (ExpressionEvaluationException e) {
090            throw new EnforcerRuleException("Unable to lookup an expression " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), e);
091        } catch (PomCheckException e) {
092            throw new EnforcerRuleException(e.getMessage());
093        }
094    }
095
096    @Override
097    public boolean isCacheable() {
098        return false;
099    }
100
101    @Override
102    public boolean isResultValid(@Nonnull EnforcerRule enforcerRule) {
103        return false;
104    }
105
106    @Nullable
107    @Override
108    public String getCacheId() {
109        return "";
110    }
111}
